column1: # Units: bio_N2O_coef:kg N2O per GJ bioenergy
# Source: Fertilizer application rates and yields from Adler et al. 2007. Ecological Applications; Fertilizer-N to N2O rate from Davidson 2009. Nature Geoscience.
# Description: Specifies region-specific assumptions in the emissions system. USA values estimated from Adler et al. 2007-with other regions indexed to USA.
